        Convert an LTL formula to a DRA.
        Parameters:

        options - which operators are allowed

        a shared_ptr to the DRA

      • nba2dra

        DRA nba2dra(NBA nba,
            int limit,
            boolean detailedStates)
     throws PrismException
        Convert an NBA to a DRA using Safra's algorithm. If limit is specified (>0), the conversion is aborted with LimitReachedException when the number of states exceeds the limit.
        Parameters:
        nba - the formula
        limit - a limit on the number of states (0 for no limit)
        detailedStates - save detailed interal information (Safra trees) in the generated states
        stutter_information - Information about the symbols that can be stuttered
        Returns:
        a shared_ptr to the created DRA
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • getOptions

        public Options_Safra getOptions()
        Get the options for Safra's algorithm
